name: Cheeseburger and Fries
description: A juicy grilled cheeseburger served with a side of crispy french fries.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Golden fried chicken tenders served with ketchup and a side of fries.

name: Mini Meatball Sliders
description: Tender mini meatballs tucked inside small, soft buns, topped with a touch of marinara sauce and a sprinkle of mozzarella cheese.

name: Mini Pizzas
description: Personal-sized pizzas with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni.

name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
description: Spaghetti topped with savory meatballs and a rich tomato sauce.

name: Fish Sticks with Tartar Sauce
description: Crispy fish sticks served with tartar sauce and a side of green peas.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Toasted bread filled with melted cheddar cheese, served with tomato soup.

name: Turkey and Cheese Wrap
description: A whole wheat wrap filled with turkey, cheese, lettuce, and tomato, served with apple slices.
